Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two people with cups, indicating they might be making an attempt at a string telephone (basic depiction of people with objects).
CANNOT: Correctly depict a string connecting the cups (student may not include the string or draw it inaccurately).
Illustrate how sound travels from one person's voice through the string to another person's ear (student doesnâ€™t show or understand sound travel).
Use the provided materials like cups and string effectively to demonstrate how the device works (student may not know how these materials relate to the concept).
Highlight key features of the device, such as how sound travels along the string (lack of knowledge about sound transmission).
Reflect on how this technology helps people communicate in different situations (student doesn't grasp the broader significance).
